name: Mutafukaz: Operation Blackhead
summary: Mutafukaz: Operation Blackhead is an animated short film based on the French comic series: “Mutafukaz”. It follows the same events of the first chapters of the comic. However, it only takes place in the moment where Angelino and Vinz are stalked by the Macho aliens disguised as police agents. The short film was released in 2002.
info:
• 上映年度: 2002年
  • 片长: 8分钟
  • 导演: Guillaume Renard, Yann Blary
